mapper.insert: insert into tb_user_info (user_id, signin_name, signin_passwdmd5, signin_passwdaes, passwd_lastdate, signup_date, signin_lastdate, nick_name, user_email, user_mphone, user_address, user_sex, head_portrait) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signinPasswdmd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signinPasswdaes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwdLastdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signinLastdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{headPortrait,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_user_info set signin_name = #{signinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signin_passwdmd5 = #{signinPasswdmd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signin_passwdaes = #{signinPasswdaes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd_lastdate = #{passwdLastdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, signup_date = #{signupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, signin_lastdate = #{signinLastdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_mphone = #{userMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=BIT}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, signin_name, signin_passwdmd5, signin_passwdaes, passwd_lastdate, signup_date, signin_lastdate, nick_name, user_email, user_mphone, user_address, user_sex, head_portrait from tb_user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
